venue.name: Cambridge Center for Adult Education, Blacksmith House

item.description:
TO ATTEND THIS CLASS, CONTACT

THE CAMBRIDGE CENTER FOR ADULT EDUCATION AT

617-547-6789, OR VIA THEIR WEBSITE  http://www.ccae.org/

Helen and Jules, Urban Homesteaders with ten years experience growing and preparing sprouts and microgreens, are offering this 3-hour class at the Cambridge Center for Adult Education (CCAE):

Come learn how to grow sprouts (jar method), microgreens AND flax/chia (tray methods) year round indoors.  Sample recipes will be shown.   

These methods are easy and fun, and there is always plenty of time for questions. Often times folks attending the class had tried to grow these things in the past, but need to trouble shoot. 

Call the teachers if you have questions about the class:  617-492-2340.

 Class size is limited to 30 people reigistered with CCAE, so please do register there is you want to attend.  If you show up the night of the class without registering with CCAE, you might not be able to take the class. 

Price: $37.00/per person
item.name: Sprouts and Microgreens: Growing and Preparing
